ingredient_analyses.name: water sugar carbonic acid colour e150d acidifier phosphoric acid natural flavor aroma caffeine
ingredient_analyses.detailed_description: Refined white sugar (sucrose) extracted from sugar cane or sugar beets through industrial processing involving chemical purification.
ingredient_analyses.health_impact: Provides empty calories with no nutritional value. Rapidly absorbed causing blood glucose spikes followed by crashes. Regular consumption linked to obesity, diabetes, dental caries, and increased inflammation markers.

flags.description: High glycemic index causes rapid blood sugar spikes
Highly refined product with all nutrients removed
Feeds harmful bacteria causing tooth decay

rag_analysis.nova_description: Processed food with added industrial ingredients. While not as harmful as ultra-processed foods, regular consumption may contribute to nutrient displacement and inflammatory compound intake.
rag_analysis.overall_health_assessment: Low concern - most ingredients appear safe with minimal processing. Consider overall dietary pattern and balance.
recommendations: Monitor total daily sugar intake from all sources to maintain healthy blood glucose levels
Balance processed foods with whole, minimally processed alternatives in your diet
